StratmasClient.map.adapter
Class PopulationAdapter

java.lang.Object
  StratmasClient.map.adapter.MapDrawableAdapter
      StratmasClient.map.adapter.MapElementAdapter
          StratmasClient.map.adapter.ElementAdapter
              StratmasClient.map.adapter.PopulationAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, StratmasObjectAdapter, StratmasEventListener
public class PopulationAdapter
extends ElementAdapter

PopulationAdapter adapts StratmasObjects descendants of Population for viewing on a map window.

setSelected

public void setSelected(boolean selected)
Make adapter changes caused by selection state changes. This is protected for a reason, DO NOT USE THIS to set the selection status of the element adapted, use getElement() and make the changes on the object instead.

Overrides:
setSelected in class MapElementAdapter
Parameters:
selected - true if it's selected.

getLocationColor

public static double[] getLocationColor(double inhabitants)
Maps inhabitants to a color. Clamps inhabitants to [0, 50000000].
